Christ Embassy Portsmouth is a place where your life will be given new meaning. You are set to be uplifted and taken to new heights in glory with every encounter you have with us in our weekly services. We invite you to make our church your home and give yourself to the ministry of God's word because in doing so, you will experience a life of increasing beauty continually.

- Pastor Muyiwa Matthew (PhD)
